summary.span: 为实例上下文返回服务的实例。

span.span: Returns the instance of the service for the instance context.
The object that represents the service instance.

exception.span: 该服务实例处于已创建或正在打开的状态，或没有初始化。

span.span: The service instance is in a created or opening state or is not initialized.

exception.span: 该服务实例已中止。

span.span: The service instance is aborted.

exception.span: 该服务实例已关闭，并且在这些状态下无法修改。

span.span: The service instance has been closed already and cannot be modified in these states.

exception.span: 该服务实例处于错误状态，并且在这些状态下无法修改。

span.span: The service instance is faulted and cannot be modified in these states.

param.name: message
param.span: 触发服务对象的创建的传入消息。

span.span: The incoming message that triggered the creation of a service object.

summary.span: 为实例上下文返回服务的实例，以响应传入消息。

span.span: Returns the instance of the service for the instance context in response to an incoming message.
The object that represents the service instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般情况下，您只能在消息到达后被定向时，通过调用 创建服务实例；如果没有消息到达，则不创建 和服务对象，因此直到实际需要时才会部署资源。The general idea is that you only create an instance of the service when a message directed at it arrives, by calling ; then if no message arrives, no is created and no service object is created, and so resources are not deployed until actually required. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_ServiceInstanceContext#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_serviceinstancecontext/cs/snippets.cs#11)]

exception.span: 该服务实例处于已创建或正在打开的状态，或没有初始化。

span.span: The service instance is in a created or opening state or is not initialized.

exception.span: 该服务实例已中止。

span.span: The service instance is aborted.

exception.span: 该服务实例已关闭，并且在这些状态下无法修改。

span.span: The service instance has been closed already and cannot be modified in these states.

exception.span: 该服务实例处于错误状态，并且在这些状态下无法修改。

span.span: The service instance is faulted and cannot be modified in these states.

summary.span: 在调用了一个同步中止操作，从而引起通信对象转换为关闭状态的情况下，该方法插入对通信对象的处理。

span.span: Inserts processing on a communication object after it transitions to the closing state due to the invocation of a synchronous abort operation.
